attributes.review: Ew there was nude photos of Donald Trump on this. Absolutely disgusting for him to do that. He needs to be eradicated❤️.

This app is astronomical-Ly bad. I downloaded it because the shelves in my local grocery store were empty in the pedi file and racism isle. So I thought I could order some online. I came across this app and downloaded it. It took 2 MONTHS to download. So not worth it. Idk what to do know they still didn’t stock the store. Should I just visit this new store called the White House and ask if there is any in stock I’m sure they’ll have some... any advice?
attributes.title: Astronomically bad

attributes.review: As a young Trump supporter, I believed that getting this app would let me watch Trump dominate over Joe Biden but, to my surprise, THE APP LITERALLY BROKE MY PHONE!!!!!😠😠😠😠😠😡 if you want to support Trump this is NOT the app to do it. It’s virus-y and the light wavelengths of the screen will seriously injure your eyes -111100000/10 DO NOT GET!!!!??!!!!!!!!!
attributes.title: PLEASE READ THIS !!!!!

attributes.review: This is by far the slowest app ever to download, load up and even try on. When I tell you I downloaded this app. It took nearly 10 minutes to download and I have the latest iPhone. Might I add that this app is also inconsistent with the blm movement and isn’t up to date at all. Might I also add that my lawn isn’t mowed and this app hasn’t helped when it said it could. The lies portrayed just like this app!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: i hate this app ,every time it popped up on my home page it made me through up like i didn’t even know that could happen? could an app be that bad?? i guess so... because this one exist.🤢🤢🤢🤮

attributes.review: Like I could you not when this app download on my phone I kept getting notifications from unknown numbers there were many notifications that my tv started to cry it was an emotion roller coaster I thought I had to put my phone down but then I had a great idea 💡 I messaged all the numbers saying that trump is an orange and they all stoped me and my tv were so happy I don’t but then we heard a knock on the door we were scared I walked to the door slowly and I  tv turned out to be all those people that were sending me messages and they said we agree with you he is an orange I couldn’t believe what I heard but then they said sikee and they took me hostage they didn’t feed me at all then i remember I had my phone on me that hole time silly me I opened my phone to try and call 911 but nobody picked up so I had a great idea what if I jurist deleted the app everything will go back to normal right so I deleted it an lucky me ☺️ I was correct everything went back to normal I truly don’t recommend downloading this app PLEAS DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP 💀
attributes.title: Worthless app 🤢🤮

attributes.review: I downloaded this app as a joke to buy tickets to his rally, but then everything got crazy. I went to get a ticket and my phone started blowing up with messages it foreign languages. Mostly Russian saying if I don’t vote for trump I would be punished but I am underage. So, I didn’t think anything of it until my house caught fire and everyone died except me. Even my baby dog died! Then when I moved to my grandma the house flooded when there was no leak or anything out of nowhere. This app is up to some crazy stuff. DONT DOWNLOAD THE APP FOR A CREEPY CHEETO PUFF MAN!!!!!
attributes.title: DONT DO IT
